amazingSpiderman102.name: Spider-Man #102
amazingSpiderman102.info: Second apperance and Origin of Morbius. [April 2022 - With the huge success of Morbius, the future of Morbius in movies is looking bright]

spiderman1.name: Spider-Man #1
spiderman1.info: First issue in self-titled series. Classic Spider-Man cover

spiderman24.name: Spider-Man #24
spiderman24.info: 1st cover appearance and 2nd full appearance of Doppelganger Spider-Man

spiderman47.name: Spider-Man #47
spiderman47.info: 1st appearance of the Grim Hunter, Vladimir Kravinoff, the son of Kraven the Hunter

spiderman49.name: Spider-Man #49
spiderman49.info: 1st appearance of Coldheart, a mother avenging her son who was accidentally killed by superheroes

spiderman52.name: Spider-Man #52
spiderman52.info: 2nd appearance of Ben Reilly as the Scarlet Spider and first mention of the name Scarlet Spider (said by a reporter)

spiderman76.name: Spider-Man #76
spiderman76.info: 1st appearance of Loxias Crown, later known as The Hunger.

amazingSpiderman389.name: the Amazing Spider-Man #389
amazingSpiderman389.info: Origin of the Chameleon and the abusive relationship he had with Kraven. [May 2022 - Chameleon rumored to be the villain of the Kraven movie]

detectivecomics359.name: Detective Comics #359
detectivecomics359.info: 1st appearance, cover and origin of Batgirl, Barbara Gordon. 1st appearance of Killer Moth in the Silver Age. [March 2022 - Leslie Grace cast as Batgirl for Batgirl Movie]

batman133.name: Batman #133
batman133.info: 1st appearance of Kite-Man. 3rd appearance of Bat-Mite. [April 2022 - Kite-Man animated series planned for HBO Max. With Kite-Man cameoing in Peacemaer and being a main character in Harley Quinn, he will most likely be a more prominent character in DC]

infiniteCrisis5.name: Infinite Crisis #5
infiniteCrisis5.info: 1st appearance of Jaime Reyes as Blue Beetle. [May 2022 - Xolo Maridue√±a cast as Jaime Reyes in Blue Beetle]

superiorIronMan1.name: Superior Iron Man #1
superiorIronMan1.info: 1st appearance and 1st issue of Superior Iron Man. [May 2022 - Although Superior Iron Man was not in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, he very well could be in the future. They casted John Krasinski because of fan request, so I could imagine the same happening for Tom Cruise]

flash141.name: Flash #141
flash141.info: 1st full appearance of the Black Flash. [April 2022 - Black Flash rumored to be the main villain in the Flash movie]

thorAnnual11.name: Thor Annual #11
thorAnnual11.info: 1st appearance of Eitri, who created Stormbreaker. [April 2022 - Peter Dinklage teases his return as Eitri in Thor: Love and Thunder]

incredibleHulk449.name: Incredible Hulk #449
incredibleHulk449.info: 1st appearance of The Thunderbolts. [June 2022 - Director Jake Schreier announced as director to a Thunderbolts project]

incredibleHulk93.name: Incredible Hulk #93
incredibleHulk93.info: 1st appearance of Korg. [April 2022 - Korg confirmed to return in Thor: Love and Thunder]

thunderstrike1.name: Thunderstrike #1
thunderstrike1.info: First solo Thunderstrike title. [June 2022 - Thunderstrike rumored for Thor: Love and Thunder]

captainAmerica25.name: Captain America #25
captainAmerica25.info: First apperance of Sam Wilson as Captain America

aquaman2.name: Aquaman #2
aquaman2.info: 1st appearance of the Trench King and 1st cameo appearance of Dr. Stephen Shin.

aquaman3.name: Aquaman #3
aquaman3.info: 1st full appearance of Dr. Stephen Shin.
